name: _write_to_brain
description: this function will write a value to the database that you will be able to retrieve later. Anything that you need to remember long term call this function to store what you want to know later.

data_value.description: the value that data_name will hold

name: _retrieve_from_brain
description: Execute this function when you cannot remember something the users has told you. This will give you a bunch of information that is stored in the users database.

name: _delete_from_brain
description: Execute this function when you or the user wants to delete something in your brain.

data_name.description: the name of the data you want to delete

name: _view_image
description: Execute this function when the user says a photo link. This function will call an AI that can view the text and tell you what it is. Make sure to summarize it in your own way and personality

instruction.description: this will tell the AI what to do with the image. You will have to instruct the AI on what you want it to do.

image_url.description: this is the image url the user has sent. Only pass the url nothing else.
